collections.name: Medicine Essentials
collections.description: A comprehensive collection of medical textbooks and resources covering various fields of medicine, including anatomy, physiology, pharmacology, pathology, and clinical practice. Ideal for medical students, healthcare professionals, and anyone interested in medical knowledge.

resources.title: Medical Library
resources.description: A collection of books pertaining to field and emergency medicine

resources.title: NHS' Medicines A to Z
resources.description: How medicines work, how and when to take them

collections.name: Prepper's Library
collections.description: A curated collection of resources for preppers and survivalists, including guides on emergency preparedness, self-sufficiency, first aid, food storage, and survival skills. Perfect for individuals looking to enhance their readiness for various scenarios.

resources.title: Canadian Prepper: Winter Prepping
resources.description: Winter Prepping: Prepare for winter survival and emergencies

resources.title: Canadian Prepper: Prepping Food
resources.description: Prepping Food: Long-term food storage and survival meals

resources.title: Urban Prepper
resources.description: A collection of recipes and techniques for preparing food

resources.title: Canadian Prepper: Bug Out Concepts
resources.description: Bug Out Concepts: Strategies and tips for effective bug-out plans

resources.title: Canadian Prepper: Bug Out Roll
resources.description: Bug Out Roll: Essential gear for your ultimate bug-out bag
